link.label: developerWorks
link.text: developerWorks is the IBM technical resource for developers that provides a wide range of tools, code, and education for IBM software as well as for open-standards technology, such as Web services, wireless technology, Linux®, XML, Java™ technologies, and more.

group.text: Web Resources
developerWorks

developerWorks is IBM's technical resource for developers, providing a wide range of tools, code, and education for Information Management, IBM Systems, Lotus®, Rational®, Tivoli®, and WebSphere® software as well as for open-standards technology, such as Web services, wireless technology, Linux®, XML, Java™ technologies, and more.

group.label: Latest developerWorks events and technical briefings

group.text:
At developerWorks, you can find the following items:
  • Product trials and downloads
  • How-to articles from introductory to advanced levels
  • Tutorials ranging from basic concepts to advanced certification instruction
  • Technical forums and blogs
  • Industry news
  • Webcasts and podcasts
  • Developer events
  • Roadmaps and sample IT projects for your on-demand environment
  • Special programs to quickly inform you about open-standards technologies and IBM products

You can apply focused and relevant technical information from developerWorks to building and deploying applications across heterogeneous systems. Use developerWorks to take full advantage of open standards and the IBM Rational Software Delivery Platform in an on demand world.

group.label: developerWorks links
group.text:
• developerWorks home
  • Download trial versions of IBM software

Web Resources
developerWorks Rational zone

For information specific to Rational tools, visit the Rational home page on developerWorks. From there you can navigate directly to product-related areas, such as for IBM Rational Application Developer and IBM Rational Software Architect, as well as to other relevant technology areas, including Enterprise Generation Language and Pattern Solutions.

group.label: Latest developerWorks articles and tutorials for Rational
developerWorks Rational links
group.text: • developerWorks Rational zone home page
Web Resources
developerWorks community

developerWorks community provides opportunities for you to get involved with fellow developers on developerWorks discussion forums, blogs, and wikis, as well as subscribe to content through Web feeds, RSS, and podcasts.

group.label: Most recently updated threads from the developerWorks Rational forums

group.text:
At developerWorks Community, you can find the following items:

• Forums: Join lively discussions that cover a wide range of topics across IBM Rational®, Information Management, IBM Systems, Lotus®, Tivoli®, WebSphere®, Web services, wireless technology, Linux®, XML, Java™ technologies, and more. Here you can pose questions, investigate ideas, and connect with peers on the issues that interest you.
• Blogs: Get keen insight into the mindsets of experts and leaders involved in the ongoing development of technology and products from IBM and across open industry standards.
• Wikis: Check out these working areas where project leaders and technology users can develop information about different subjects.
• Podcasts: Listen weekly for audio overviews of new content and other cool features on developerWorks and for interviews with a broad range of technical experts, both inside and outside IBM, who offer insights and discuss technology innovations and evolution.
• Subscriptions: Subscribe to content from across developerWorks through common syndication standards like RSS and Atom. Or customize a feed from our site to display on your own Web page.

  • developerWorks Web feeds
Web Resources
alphaWorks

alphaWorks provides a unique opportunity for early-adopter developers around the world to experience the latest innovations from IBM. These emerging technologies are available for download at the earliest stages of research and development, enabling you to evaluate and influence IBM research and development.

At alphaWorks you can collaborate with both IBM and non-IBM developers on individual technologies and emerging technology topics impacting the IT world. alphaWorks has been successfully helping IBM connect with innovative developers to lead the advancement of promising new standards, products, and open source technology since 1996.

To date, 40 percent of the technologies posted to the alphaWorks Web site have been incorporated into IBM products or licensed to third-party developers, and over 200 technologies are now available for download. These technologies have garnered much industry attention and have won numerous awards, including the 2003 Jolt award from the Software Developers Journal for best developer Web site. The alphaWorks business model has been featured in The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, and the Harvard Business Review.

group.label: alphaWorks links
group.text: • alphaWorks home
Web Resources
PartnerWorld

IBM PartnerWorld is a worldwide program for IBM Business Partners that offers sales and marketing tools, skill-building courses, and technical support to help you grow your business and drive increased profit.

PartnerWorld puts a wealth of offerings at your fingertips to help you deliver solutions that address your customers' business needs. As your membership level increases, you become eligible to receive increasingly valuable benefits and support from IBM.

When you team with IBM as a commercial software developer whose business is developing and delivering solutions to the marketplace, you team with a company that appreciates the position of ISV Business Partners. PartnerWorld is focused on working with you to enable your applications and deliver solutions with the potential for unrivaled market opportunity.

Among the opportunities open to ISVs and all members of PartnerWorld is participation in the PartnerWorld Industry Networks, which provide access to a rich set of powerful marketing, sales, and technical benefits based on your commitment to go to market with IBM.
